page.title: 18Holiday Preferences
page.content: We asked every pupil in our school where he or she was going on holiday this year. To our surprise most people said they were staying at home in Hellifield. Other popular holiday resorts were S.Wales, Scarborough, Bridlington and Cornwall. When we asked children where their families liked to go for a day out, the favourite places were Blackpool and Morecambe. Our favourite activities on holiday include playing on the beach, collecting shells, swimming in the sea and watching sea-birds. Fishing is another thing we like to do and sailing in boats. Night -time activities we enjoy are walks, disco-dancing, flying kites and visits to the amusement arcades.
